rules.description: Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change escape to hyper if pressed with other keys
Change tab to hyper if pressed with other keys
Double tap and hold left_command to become hyper. Once released, returns to left_command.
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change escape to hyper if pressed with other keys
Change tab to hyper if pressed with other keys
Double tap and hold left_command to become hyper. Once released, returns to left_command.

manipulators.description: Move focus to the next/southern window

to.shell_command: yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus stack.first || yabai -m window --focus south || yabai -m window --focus first

manipulators.description: Move focus to the previous/northern window

to.shell_command: yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus stack.last || yabai -m window --focus north || yabai -m window --focus last

manipulators.description: Move focus to the previous/western window

to.shell_command: yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus stack.last || yabai -m window --focus west || yabai -m window --focus last

manipulators.description: Move focus to the next/eastern window

to.shell_command: yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus stack.first || yabai -m window --focus east || yabai -m window --focus first
